quote: It’s not a war. It’s an annihilation,” he’d mumbled low for her ears only. She’d been unable to respond, only focusing on her own breath and marveling that she in fact was still breathing.
quote_letters: ITS NOT A WAR ITS AN ANNIHILATION HED MUMBLED LOW FOR HER EARS ONLY SHED BEEN UNABLE TO RESPOND ONLY FOCUSING ON HER OWN BREATH AND MARVELING THAT SHE IN FACT WAS STILL BREATHING
